Text: A staggering 22,000 jobs are now on the line, including 9,000 in the UK alone, after the company failed to secure a deal with creditors and shareholders that could plug a £250m gap in its finances.
Cause: the company failed to secure a deal with creditors and shareholders that could plug a £250m gap in its finances.
Effect: A staggering 22,000 jobs are now on the line, including 9,000 in the UK alone
Sentence: <e2>A staggering 22,000 jobs are now on the line, including 9,000 in the UK alone</e2>, after <e1>the company failed to secure a deal with creditors and shareholders that could plug a £250m gap in its finances.</e1>
